channel.description: Recent content in Crochet Along Together on edel grace altares

item.title: National Crochet Month 2017: Mystery Crochet Along Clues 1 & 2
item.description: The group []() on Ravelry are holding an MCAL (Mystery Crochet Along) which I am taking part of. The project is an amigurumi. I have never made an amigurumi before and this will be my first! It will be interesting seeing that I have no idea what the finished project will look like. These are the first two clues finished. I still need to start clue 3 and 4, I’m a little behind.

item.title: Crochet Along Together #1: Easy as 1-2-3 Cowl (Part 1)
item.description: The fine folks at Skacel Knitting are hosting a series they call “Crochet Along Together” or “CAT” for short. They post videos throughout the month to walk you through the project. A draw is also held after the project is finished. March CAT This is their very first installment and is geared towards (but not limited to) beginners to crochet. The project for this months is the Easy As 1-2-3 Cowl which is a three colour cowl.
